column1: @entity0 rode his bike to his house on Monday.  He wanted to get home to get some yogurt.  On Tuesday, @entity0 looked over his shoulder and saw @entity1.  @entity1 was looking around in the fridge.  On Friday, @entity0 walked on the ice.  He fell down.  @entity1 had a saying for such things, but he forgot what it was.  @entity1 played ball with a duck.  He did not play ball with a dog, cat, or mouse.  On Sunday, @entity0 wrote a lot down on a piece of paper.  @entity0 wrote a lot about his lip.  @entity0 then walked around.  @entity0 took a look at a pan in the kitchen.  @entity0 then walked around in the vegetable garden.  @entity1 was standing in the garden.  @entity1 asked @entity0 if he wanted to play.  @entity0 said no.  @entity0 did not want to play with anyone.  @entity1 walked away.  @entity0 went inside.  @entity0 walked into the living room and sat on the couch.
@placeholder day was @entity1 looking around in the fridge
